messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Stay vigilent crew evil lurks in every corner on this station! go to the chapel to get blessed if you feel wickedness creeping in!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Base Construction.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Time for the big sleep bye crew

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Robuster 9000 Mk.3 (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">FAGGOT CAT PERSON OPERATES AT BAR!</font>

messages.author: Robuster 9000 Mk.3 (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">BREAKING NEWS! ROBUST CHEMIST PREPARES SUPPLY OF BEAKERS TO LAST A LIFETIME. NO MORE CRYING TO USE CARGO'S AUTOLATHE!</font>

messages.author: Robuster 9000 Mk.3 (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">BREAKING NEWS! U N R O B U S T SECURITY TEAM RELIES ON RIOT SHIELD, BULLETPROOF HELMET, REFLECTOR VEST, AND DISABLER RIFLE TO BE EFFECTIVE AS SECURITY! WILL HE SAVE THE STATION OR DIE TO AN ASSISTANT? WE WILL SEE!</font>

messages.author: Robuster 9000 Mk.3 (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">BREAKING NEWS! LOCAL HEAD OF PERSONNEL KILLS A JANITOR IN SELF DEFENCE AFTER JANITOR SHOOTS AT HOP WITH A SAWN OFF SHOTGUN! MEDICAL IS GETTING RIGHT TO WORK ON THE JANITOR AND THE JANITOR WILL BE EXPECTING A LOT OF TIME IN PRISON.</font>

messages.author: Robuster 9000 Mk.3 (AI)
messages.body:
CLOWN AND JANITOR SENTANCED TO LIFE IN JAIL!
ABUSED BY THE HOP!
